item.title: Find the duplicate number
item.description: 总结 Leetcode find-the-duplicate-number 的做法。 Problem Given an array nums containing n + 1 integers where each integer is between 1 and n(inclusive), prove that at least one duplicate number must exist. Assume that there is only one duplicate number, find the duplicate one. Example 1: 1 2 Input: [1,3,4,2,2] Output: 2 Example 2: 1 2 Input: [3,1,3,4,2] Output: 3 Note: You must not modify the array
